chiSiamo.title: About us
chiSiamo.lead: Not just a story, but a journey together with you.
chiSiamo.para1: Every great project starts from an idea, an intuition, a spark that ignites passion. Ours began with the desire to offer something different: not just quality services, but an experience that leaves a mark.
chiSiamo.para2: We are the right mix of experience and freshness, but what really sets us apart is our approach. We believe in the value of people, attention to detail and the ability to turn our clients' needs into concrete and innovative solutions.
uniqueList: Authentic passion – We put our heart into what we do every day.
Constant innovation – We don't follow trends, we create them.
Human relationships – The client is a growth partner, not a number.
chiSiamo.missionText: We want to create a bond with those who choose to entrust us, offering not only a service, but a true experience. We are here to listen, advise and accompany you to success.
chiSiamo.contactCTAText: Want to know more about us? Contact us or visit us, we'd love to meet you!

cards.title: When was the last time you reviewed your plant inspections?
cards.body: Earthing systems, pressure equipment, lifting gear… the reports are scattered across emails, drawers and different suppliers.

cards.title: Worried about being unprepared if an inspection shows up?
cards.body: You know you should be compliant, yet if INAIL, ASL or a third-party body walked in tomorrow… you wouldn’t feel completely at ease.

cards.title: Do you feel you’re spending without a clear overview?
cards.body: You pay for inspections and consulting, but nobody gives you a clear picture of what is really needed and what is just paperwork.

howItWorksSection.title: How Zero Risk Check-up works
howItWorksSection.subtitle: From the initial assessment to day-to-day coordination: a method designed to keep you ahead of deadlines and confident during audits.
howItWorksSection.cta: I want my Zero Risk Check-up

steps.title: Initial Check-up
points: Assessment of machinery, equipment and existing documentation.
Mapping of applicable regulations and identification of priorities.

steps.title: Zero Risk Plan
points: Comprehensive plan with scheduled inspections, deadlines, roles and responsibilities.
Risk exposure evaluation and sustainable remediation options.

steps.title: Management & support
points: Execution or coordination of inspections, reminders and continuous updates.
Guidance during audits and handling of authority requests.
